headers.value: camera=(), microphone=(), geolocation=(), payment=(), usb=(), magnetometer=(), gyroscope=(), accelerometer=(), ambient-light-sensor=(), autoplay=(), encrypted-media=(), fullscreen=(self), picture-in-picture=()

default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com https://api.fontshare.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com https://api.fontshare.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com https://api.fontshare.com; img-src 'self' data: https:; connect-src 'self' https://bitealert-backend.onrender.com https://bitealert-backend-doga.onrender.com https://*.vercel.app; frame-ancestors 'none'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self'; object-src 'none'; upgrade-insecure-requests;
